get.description: Get all identifiers that are available to add to an order Rate limit: 150 / minute

post.description: Get all identifiers for a list of orderIds Rate limit: 150 / minute
Create or update an order identifier Rate limit: 150 / minute
Delete an identifier. This will also remove the identifier from all orders that it's assigned to Rate limit: 150 / minute
Add an identifier to an order Rate limit: 250 / minute
Remove an identifier from an order Rate limit: 250 / minute

Returns low fidelity view of open orders. The data is generally useful for very basic view or counters of what is in the open orders. Useful for finding orders quickly as it returns all scannable fields of the order and order items such as order ids, skus, barcodes etc. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.DespatchConsoleNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Open order details by order ids. Not limited by the number of orders you can retrieve. This call is designed to return ONLY open orders, it is much faster than GetOrderDetail call Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ViewOrderDetailsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Assign Stock to Orders Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.OpenOrdersNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

RebuildCacheIfRequired.description:
If only the currently built stats are required, pass false here. Useful for polling whether a long running cache build has finished
The default is true.

SaveIdentifiersRequest.description: The identifier to save. For a new identifier, only the name, tag and image url are required.

Tag.description: Tag of the order identifier to delete. E.g. CUSTOM_PRINT. It is not possible to delete a system tag such as AMAZON_PRIME

ChangeOrderIdentifierRequest.description: Add/remove from all orders in the request body to the provided tag

OrderIds.description: Primary key of the orders to assign/unassign the identifier to.

Tag.description: Identifier tag to assign/unassign. E.g. AMAZON_PRIME

LocationId.description: (Optional) Fulfilment location id. Defaults to Default location

Orders.description: List of low fidelity order headers with order items, composites and product identifiers

OrderIds.description: List of order ids as unique identifiers

DetailLevel.description: (optional) List of detail level limiters. If the list is null or empty Full details will be returned, as in all detail levels are applied

SuccessfulOrders.description: List of orders that were moved

KeyedErrors.description: Dictionary of keyed errors. These are the same errors as per the Errors property, but indexable by orderId
